author: Chris Steffen
title: Album Premiere: The Gitas, ‘Beverly Kills’
text: RSS By Chris Steffen ​Sitars and rock and roll energy come together on the Gitas' debut LP, Beverly Kills . The Los Angeles trio pays tribute to Hinduism, Twin Peaks and resistance across its 13 widely-varied tracks. Opener "Manta" brings the aforementioned sitars into the picture, while "Check Out the Violence" deftly captures the raw, fuzzy intensity of Bleach -era Nirvana , and "Not Alive" builds on a slow-burn lurch that leads to an eruption. Beverly Kills is due out on February 17. Beverly Kills can be ordered here . Want to premiere an album or song on AllMusic? Drop us a line: .
